name: Running Old Game On Windows 10 Simulator 2020
name_original: Running Old Game On Windows 10 Simulator 2020
description:
Have you ever experienced pain, frustration and anxiety of editing configuration files, running different compatibility modes*, mounting forgotten .iso images (because your new PC does not have a CD drive) and searching through your old stuff, to find CD cover with CD key on it, that eventually ended in disappointment (as it often happens with things we are nostalgic about), because that game you remembered from your childhood was never that good in the first place and you will spend rest of your adult life working, then your body will get old, and one day you will die?

Would you like to relive it? Regardless of your answer, I present you Running Old Game On Windows 10 Simulator 2020, an anti-game about just that .  Have... Fun?

* It never works, so don't even bother
